articles.description: Andy Murray extends his retirement roadshow at Paris 2024 with another epic win alongside Dan Evans to move into Olympic men's doubles quarter-finals.
articles.title: Olympics tennis: Andy Murray and Dan Evans through to Paris 2024 quarter-finals

articles.description: Simone Biles says she knew she and her American team-mates would win Olympic gold when she did not get flashbacks to Tokyo.
articles.title: Simone Biles has 'no flashbacks' as she helps USA to women's team gold

articles.description: Daniel Wiffen has become the first athlete from Northern Ireland to win an Olympic gold medal in 36 years in the 800m freestyle in Paris.
articles.title: Olympics swimming: Daniel Wiffen wins historic gold in 800m freestyle

articles.description: Your day-by-day guide to what is happening when - and who to watch out for - at the Paris 2024 Olympics.
articles.title: Olympics schedule & day-by-day guide to key events & British medal hopes at Paris 2024

articles.description: Find out the medal table from the Paris Olympics 2024, including overall medals, gold medals, silver medals and bronze medals for Team GB and other countries.
articles.title: Olympic Medal Table - Paris 2024 gold, silver & bronze tally

articles.description: Great Britain retain their 4x200m freestyle relay Olympic title to secure the team's first swimming gold in Paris.
articles.title: Olympic swimming: Great Britain retain relay title to win first swimming gold in Paris

articles.description: A striking image of Brazilian surfer Gabriel Medina at Paris 2024 has captured imaginations across the globe.
articles.title: Olympics 2024: Is this gravity-defying surfing image the photo of the Games?

articles.description: Former England batter Jonathan Trott has the right personality to be the perfect foil for Jos Buttler in their new-look white-ball set-up, says former fast bowler Steven Finn in his latest column.
articles.title: England cricket: Jonathan Trott right man to join Jos Buttler as white-ball leaders - Steven Finn column

articles.description: Nathan Hales wins Great Britain's third gold medal of the Paris Olympics in the men's trap shooting final.
articles.title: Olympics shooting: Great Britain's Nathan Hales wins men's trap gold

articles.description: Will the triathlon become a duathlon? What will make the River Seine safe? BBC Sport looks at the key questions after the men's individual triathlon is postponed.
articles.title: The key questions answered after Olympic triathlon postponement
